163163802.machine_title:
CRYOVAC C106 E  dip tank
Shrinking tunnels
163163802.machine_desc:
Automatic hot water dip tank designed to shrink bags and to remove the
wrinkles caused by the vacuum process to optimise the pack apperance
and to improve the pack security. PLC controlled. Insulated water
tank. Motorised conveyor for transfer packages into the machine,
immerse them in the water for a pre-determined time and then discharge
them. 
Inside measurements of the insine of the bath: 90cm x45cm x25cm

Excellent working condition, 
Video's of operating machine available. 

The dip tank can be very well used in combination with our Cryovac
vacuuming machine. 
Please see our other advertisement for this machine.
abcs://abc.resale.info/en/cryovac-vs-20-dc-vacuum-packaging-machin ...

149211566.machine_desc:
Vacuum packaging device CRYOVAC BM5 M340 in good used and functional
condition. Combination of vacuum packer and clipper (manufacturer
Tipper Tie). Designed for bags/bags, for simple packaging of poultry
and large pieces of meat. Machine is rollable. Dimensions B/T/H
100/70/150 cm. Operating voltage 400 volts.

robotic bag loader, type: BLR1, serial num
163724172.machine_desc:

conveyor, plastic mesh belt, belt width: 330 mm, total dimensions:

width: 980 mm, total dimensions: 1400 mm x 1400 mm x 1450 mm.
